title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4028.2 - Change of jockey
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4028.2 - Change of jockey

State Regulations

Any change of jockey must be sanctioned by the stewards
and if no satisfactory reason is given for the change the commission steward
may suspend or fine any person found culpable in the matter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4028.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
